oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Werthan Bag Exhibit Booth at the Tennessee State Fair, 1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the first prize arts and crafts projects from the Nashville Housing Authority's arts and crafts exhibit displayed at the Werthan Bag booth during the 1953 Tennessee State Fair. The articles were made by students from the Summer Arts and Crafts Program, which was sponsored by the Nashville Housing Authority's Community Service Division. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
